title: Razor DAO - ❓•》faq
html:
What is Razor?
RazorDAO is the official organization that provides a native  wallet for Movement Labs on the M1, M2 and MEVM networks. 
RazorDAO also owns RazorDex (@RazorDex_ on twitter, https://razordex.xyz on your browser) which offers a Decentralized Exchange Protocol on the M1 and M2 networks on Movement Labs.
Our official X account is https://x.com/RazorDao and @RazorDex_

title: Razor DAO - ❓•》faq
html:
What is the R-1 role?
The @R-1 role is our primary supporters role. It is awarded to users who have made active efforts in one way or another to support the project’s development by using the platform or spreading the word. Until the next phase, it’s really easy to get considering that everyone on this discord right now is “early”. There are however no guaranteed ways to get it except by carrying out genuine actions towards our growth. We’re always watching. 
The other role @Day 1 OG is no longer available as it was only given to those who were on the discord within the first weeks of launch.

title: Razor DAO - ❓•》faq
html:
HOW DO I ACTIVELY CONTRIBUTE TO THE PROJECT?

1. Always ensure you’re up to date with the zealy tasks on #🚀•》razor-missions 
2. Write a well detailed thread about RazorDAO and RazorDex on Twitter and tag us (and Movement Labs. 100 likes and/or retweets unlocks a special perk).
3. Genuinely talk to your friends about us. Don’t do it as a “farming” service but because you believe in what we’re building. (I’ve asked a lot of people who invited them and those people were rewarded.) It doesn’t end with the @R-1 role. There are newer perks that will only be available to those who got the R-1 and remained active. Also, this won’t happen most likely, but extended inactivity after getting the role might lead to loss of the role. It is highly unlikely however. We just ask that you remain active.

title: Razor DAO - ❓•》faq
html:
SO HOW TO RAZOR? 

Head over to the chrome store and install Razor Wallet. Set up your wallet and back up your seed phrase. 

Use the in-app faucet tool to get $MOVE on the M1 and M2 networks.

Head over to https://razordex.xyz and perform simple actions such as swap and adding/removing liquidity. Drop any errors encountered or other impressions or suggestions in #🔄•》feedback .
